com.aurel.track.admin.customize.workflow.activity

Interface IValueConverter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractValueConverter, BooleanSetterConverter, CompositeSelectSetterConverter, CustomSelectSetterConverter, DateSetterConverter, DoubleSetterConverter, IntegerSetterConverter, ItemPickerSetterConverter, MultipleSelectSetterConverter, ParentSetterConverter, StringSetterConverter, SystemSelectSetterConverter

    public interface IValueConverter
    Convert a field specific value from String (stored or submitted) and back

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Object getActualValueFromStoredString(java.lang.String value, java.lang.Integer setter)
      Convert the string to object value after load

      • getMergedValueFromStoredStrings

        java.lang.Object getMergedValueFromStoredStrings(java.lang.String configValue,
                                               java.lang.String assignedValue,
                                               java.lang.Integer setter)
        Merge the configured and assigned value. Typically assigned takes precedence if exists (parameterized activity) otherwise the configured (no parameters) A real merge makes sense if some parts are configured (not parameterized) and other parts are parameterized (like e-mail activity parts)
        Parameters:
        configValue - the value set by workflow configuration
        assignedValue - the value set by workflow assignment
        setter -
        Returns:
